name: Gurdeep Kaur
text:
After 20 years of a yummy relationship with papa johns, I guess itâ€™s time to move on.
Thanks to the East Brunswick team.ðŸ˜’ â€¦More

name: Xavier Sneary
text: Always super polite and punctual whether I order pick up or delivery. Out of the PJâ€™s Iâ€™ve been to, this has been my favorite one. Good pizza, good deals.

name: lit one
text: Always on point. Easy to order either on the phone or on the net. Always in time and always has the same great taste that you can expect from Pap Johns.  Also, one of the only local pizza establishment that are open as late with a consistent flavor. Quick and relatively economical

name: Rory Salzman
text: My first time there.  Ordered a small works pizza.  To my surprise, without asking if there were any specials, the manager informed me that I could get a large works for less than the small.  Not only did he save me money, but in about 7 â€¦More

name: Adiba Syed
text: Great rewards and specialsðŸ˜Š their pan pizza is delicious!!

name: Christopher Onorato
text: I went for an interview and Tyrone the hiring manager was very disrespectful. He told me it was unprofessional to call him by his first name because I'm 26.  Tyrone if you are so old and demand so much respect you should probably get a better job than Papa Johns.

name: Giulia G
text: Every time I have spoken to the staff on the phone they were always very pleasant and helpful.  Great customer service. The food was also delivered quickly.

name: Nagaraj Thota
text: Their garlic sauce is awesome..but sadly they charge 50c now. :-)

name: Eternally Yeo-Seong
text: Awesome pizza and customer service. Though I always feel like they are understaffed. I once went to pick up my pizza and there was one man making pizza, picking up the phone, talking to me, making the boxes, etc. They need to hire more people or something!

name: Arun Ayyagari
text: Never get order right. They always mess up. What's worse is they mess up even after mentioning online and calling before order. And when asked , they get rude and hang up on customers. Worse pizza, worst service. Not sure how this franchise â€¦More

name: Sehrish Sheraz
text: Great pizza n great staff

name: Papi sharif
text: Nice and clean place, friendly staff and on time service

name: Nathya Benitez
text: I ordered from here a few days ago and the person that put my order together forgot extra garlic. He apologized when I called and said he would just give me a free large for my next order. I called today and this girl named Amir answred the â€¦More

name: Justin alexander
text: I dont know who answered the phone but was  very professional and gave me all the info i needed and didnt have to ask most places i have to ask for it but he told me everything and even checked for a coupon without asking, very good job sir.

name: Kevin Griffin
text: this is the 2nd time i've ordered the buffalo chicken pizza and both times they didn't have the buffalo sauce on it. its really not a hard job and they do well to mess up the easiest things

name: Igor Levyash
text: Ordered pizza. was told 30-40 min. Pizza arrived 1.5 hrs later. The pie was cold and with wrong ingredients. Called store on Rt 18, E. Brunswick, manager promised to deliver another pizza, but it did not happen. â€¦More

name: Buno Juno
text: Manager is alawys feisty  on phone after 4th exo putting this review,  and no to very little to NO  customer service appreciation skills  while answering and hanging up Phone. Everyone pay for food and service.

name: TONY SOUZA
text: I ordered a pizza and some chicken wings 40 min later I called to check on my order and I was in hold for 27 min, after that I hang up and went to Mcdonald to get some thing else. â€¦More

name: merilio quezada
text:
Great service and fast delivery.
I usually order for my staffs on the weekends

name: amit jain
text: Good quick bite

name: Shrutej Patel
text: Order Pizza here today and they messed up on my order. Moreover, staff is not capable of handling online inquires. Why promote online for promotions if the staff cannot help with the request or has no idea of the promotions offered on the website.

name: Alice Michael
text: Papa johns would not honor entertainment book promotion.  Tyrone said he had same promotion in his register when he didn't.  He was rude when I tried to show him the entertainment book coupon.  I left in tears.

name: Fady gamal
text: Nice place

name: Virendra Verma
text: Sells delicious pizza

name: Sheraz Asghar
text: Excellent

name: Piyush Shah
text: Good customer service.

name: Rachel Romano
text: there is no worse pizza than this.

name: TAMMY MINOR
text: Yes....they need to do a total replacement on this staff....bad news and attitudes!

name: Marissa Connors
text: U suck

name: Jeka Berger
text: my large pizza was supposed to have chicken. most slices didn't even have it!!!  very annoyed with how cheap they are when making pizza!
